channel.title: The Psychology of Money - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: You don’t have to be a genius to do well with money. You just need to have the proper set of emotional and behavioral skills. These skills have nothing to do with having a finance degree. You must factor in Luck when making financial decisions. What seems like a dumb financial decision to one person, may be smart from someone else’s point of view. Depending on their life outlook, their mental model of the world, goals, and current circumstances.
